description: This spicy potato salad is perfectly balanced by the addition of salty feta cheese.
keywords: Potato salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Jalapeno & Roast Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a baking tray, combine with potatoes with the seasoning and rosemary and oil and bake for 20 minutes.
Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and fry the obacon lardons for 3 minutes.
Add the onions and garlic to the pan and fry for a further 5 minutes.
Once everything is cooked, allow to cool slightly. Combine all ingredients together before serving.
